attributes.review: DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP IF YOU VALUE YOUR PRIVACY!!! I reverse programmed the app and traced it back to a Russian spyware company! Please, my fellow Americans, do not download this app!
attributes.title: When I downloaded it, russians started collecting my data!!

attributes.review: Don’t understand why it wants my personal info. It’s glitchy and I hate the layout.

attributes.review: This app is bad I got hacked and my whole phone is messed up I just wanted to support trump

attributes.review: this app is horrific! a nasty orange ✨cheeto✨ is the first thing is see when i open the app. i had high expectations for this app but was GREATLY disappointed!! don’t download that app💕💕😫😫😎😎🥰🥰

attributes.review: hearing trump voice made me gag so much it basically made me bulimic AND it crashed my phone for a week. this app is trash 🗑

attributes.review: this apps says it is #1 in news but i was unable to find any news... i really want to be here for donny but it’s hard when he isn’t reaching out and putting in as much support as we are 🇺🇸 please update and fix the app so we can make america great again ✊🏼🙂🇺🇸🇺🇸🇺🇸🇺🇸🇺🇸
